Room.Name: Boar's Arse Stairs
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the landing midway between the upper floors and the main tap in the Boar's Arse Pub.
Room.LongDescription: There's a lot of drinking going on down below, and a lot of laughter, too. but occasionally someone gets their feeling hurt, and when that happens a fight breaks out. Even the waitresses take part, and when someone gets killed the body is simply dragged to the alley door.
